input.sentences: a trip to the dentist can be a scary thing with people in masks holding sharp instruments and poking at your mouth .
even though most dentist offices try to give the patient plenty of time to relax and adjust before working on them .
sometimes there are long wait periods in which a person only becomes more anxious .
in other countries going to the dentist can be considered a privilege due to extreme poverty .
preventive care is the key to better and more stress free visits .
output.sentences: I hate the trip to the scary dentist with sharp tools.
It isn't a time to relax since it is plenty scary.
Outside the other patients wait for long periods in person.
They think its a privilege for the extreme poverty stricken patients get free dental.
But honestly for me, these visits for preventive dental conditions stress me out greatly.
